title: 999 aram wins. looking to Riot to help with #1000
body: I see you guys do this with Normals, any luck playing with you guys in an Aram? I main mid lane. I have attached a mouse drawn picture of my favorite fish giving you a rose.

replies.body: Just sit in the bush all game then?
gotta go make some food and things. be back on around 9:30 cst or tomorrow 5ish cst

MOOBEAT, IRONSTYLUS, SOMEONE.

PLZ PLAY WITH THIS GUY. HE EVEN MADE YOU A LOVELY PICTURE.
Rito Man, play a game with this guy!
